ch1Alarm.title: Channel 1 Alarm
ch1Alarm.description: Indicates if an alarm following a state change is active on channel 1

ch2Alarm.title: Channel 2 Alarm
ch2Alarm.description: Indicates if an alarm following a state change is active on channel 2

ocAlarm.title: Open Collector Alarm
ocAlarm.description: Indicates if an alarm following a state change is active on the open collector input
